posts.post_content:
I'm looking to kick off a set of Sovereign back T205s in any condition, so if you have one you'd like to offer, let me know.  I may buy a few as well, so give me a shout if you have one for sale.  I'm also going to do the same with T206s, but haven't got around to getting organized on those yet...

Cheers,
Geno

posts.post_title: I've got the following I would trade
posts.post_content:
